function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

if (!input) {
return ”;

return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

5
Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)

VISIT EXCITING DESTINATIONS: In the Monopoly World Tour board game, you can imagine visiting different locations, making travel goals, discovering facts, and completing trips to win
MONOPOLY TRAVEL GAME: In this edition of the Monopoly game, properties are destinations. Destination cards include travel goals and location facts. Players stamp the dry-erase gameboard with token stampers to complete goals. Fun kids games or travel board games for adults and kids!
MAKE MEMORIES WITH TRAVEL JOURNAL CARDS: When player draws Travel Journal card, they stamp it and it becomes a permanent part of the game!
FUN BOARD GAMES FOR FAMILIES: Whether you’re looking for kids board games, travel games, or games for adults, get the family together for fun family games like this Monopoly travel edition where properties are destinations from around the world!
GREAT GIFTS FOR FAMILY WITH KIDS: Monopoly games are board games for kids and adults, making them great family board games and gifts for families!

item.title: Kids Against Maturity: Card Game for Kids and Families, Super Fun Hilarious for Family Party Game Night
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)



BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and funny innuendos for the adults, it can be enjoyed by all ages. Best results when played with 4 players or more.
PLAY IT ANY TIME ANY PLACE – One game set includes 600 question and answer cards and a handy box to store it all. It’s portable and a take anywhere size game. Become an instant champion while camping, sleepovers, game nights, family gatherings, summer camp, plane trips and more!
IT’S SIMPLE & ABSOLUTELY HILARIOUS – Kids Against Maturity combines the tried and tested fill-in-the- blank game-play, a perfect enjoyable hilarious way to bring your family together.
GET THE GAME ROLLING IN SECONDS – Each player gets 10 white answer cards and takes turns asking the blue question cards. Each question asker chooses the funniest answer, and the player with the highest amount of most amusing responses, wins the game.
OBLIGATORY WARNING – Humorless hover-parents and those who don’t appreciate flatulence jokes, may not approve. PLEASE REMOVE ANY CARD THAT YOU DON’T APPROVE OF. One thing is for sure; just like other tabletop board games, it’ll get your kids away from their phones, tablets, Fortnite, and other electronic devices for at least 30-90 min. Unplug together!

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)

Contains age appropriate content for a true family card game experience that you can enjoy playing on Family Game Night.

item.title: OLA ART Shut The Box Game Wooden for 2-6 Players, Wooden Board Table Math Game with 16 Dice, Board Game for Kids Adults, Family Classroom Home Party or Pub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)



What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, it is one of the most popular math games
Origin of The Game: The history of this game is not much more than vague folklore — No one really knows when and where the game originated. It may have originated in Normandy, France around the 12th Century. It is believed to have been a popular game amongst fur trappers of the Hudson Bay Company in the 19th Century. It is said to have also been popular among sailors and fishermen. This centuries old game is great for teaching kids basic addition and subtraction. It helps to build mental math skills and is really fun to play
Endless Fun for Every Occasion：This classic pub game is a great addition to any game night of holiday get-together! Gather your friends and family around this addicting dice game, and put your math and strategy skills to the test. Whether you make some friendly wagers or just play for fun, Shut the Box is sure to entertain
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Premium Felt ensure the lower noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game and hours of fun while playing
Multiple Ways to Play: There are different ways of playing Shut the Box. Read the instructions or you find and learn about options online by searching “How to Play Shut the Box” or “Shut the Box Game Variations”.

4.5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)

item.title: 3 Card Games, UNO, Phase 10, ONO 99, Gifts for Kids, Adults and Family Night, Storage Tin Box |Travel Games
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) In this exclusive tin full of fun, card lovers will find 3 exciting games from Mattel -the UNO Card Game, Phase 10 Card Game and ONO 99 Card Game. Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99 - $15.20
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:44 UTC – Details)



In this exclusive tin full of fun, card lovers will find 3 exciting games from Mattel -the UNO Card Game, Phase 10 Card Game and ONO 99 Card Game. Each deck offers unique game play for a different experience:
The UNO Card Game is about color and number matching, the Phase 10 Card Game involves creating card series rummy-style and the ONO 99 Card Game challenges players to add cards up without hitting 99!
The 3 card games test a range of skills and let players either focus on one game or mix it up for a full night of friendly competition!
The decorative tin keeps the card decks and instructions neatly stored away when not in play.
Makes a great gift for houses that host kid, teen, adult or family game nights.

5
Price: $16.99 - $15.20
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Great Christmas Decorations: Made of metal wire, the Christmas deer decorations are durable, corrosion-resistant and can withstand harsh wind and weather conditions. This set of 3 reindeer decoration outdoor yard includes a buck, a doe and a fawn in different poses, with 3D modelling and vivid poses to make the reindeer Christmas decoration look even more charming and cute, it is the perfect Christmas outdoor decorations to welcome your family.
Easy to Assemble: The deer Christmas decorations are easy to assemble without tools, as all the parts snap into place with ease. The stunning deer Christmas decorations can be completed in minutes. Each deer has an individual plug to display them individually or together.
Lighted Design: The outdoor Christmas reindeer has built-in 240 LED lights to create the perfect night display. Just simply plug in and unplug to turn the lights on and off. The lights make the outdoor Christmas reindeer extremely attractive and bring an eye-catching view to your lawn and yard.
Elegant Details: Celebrate the season with a heartwarming snapshot of a deer family, intricately designed with festive details like shining red bows and a shimmery fabric; BUCK DIMENSIONS: 24″(L) x 51″(W) x 60″(H); DOE DIMENSIONS: 22″(L) x 12″(W) x 47″(H); FAWN DIMENSIONS: 18.5″(L) x 6.3″(W) x 27.5″(H)
Perfect for Outdoor Christmas Decorations: The reindeer outdoor decorations are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations. Reindeer outdoor decorations can decorate any place, such as lawns, front porches, patios, gardens. It also makes a great Christmas gift for friends and family.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $54.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:06 UTC – Details)


A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it. In Mysterium, one player takes on the role of the ghost and over the course of a week, tries to lead the investigators to their culprit. Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you? Can the psychics determine the weapon, location and killer or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder? Contents: 6 Intuition tokens, 6 sleeves, 6 clairvoyance level markers, 36 clairvoyance tokens, clock board, 4 progress boards, 18 character psychic cards, 18 location psychic cards, 18 object psychic cards, sand timer, 18 character ghost cards, 18 location ghost cards, 18 object ghost, 6 ghost tokens, 84 vision cards, 6 culprit tokens, 3 crow markers, clairvoyance track; rulebook. In the 1920’s, Mr. MacDowell, a gifted astrologist, entered in his new house when he immediately detected a supernatural being. Gathering eminent mediums of his time for an extraordinary séance, they will have 7 hours to contact the ghost and investigate to unlock an old mystery. Unable to talk, the amnesic ghost will communicate with the mediums through visions (illustrated cards). They will have to decipher the images to help the ghost remember how he was murdered (who? where? which weapon?). The more they cooperate and guess, well, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit. This party game is one of the most anticipated games, thanks to innovative, thrilling and immersive features. It offers cooperation and investigation with an asymmetrical gameplay. While playing the ghost or a medium, you will have fun trying to guess what other players have in their minds! So enter in this strange manor and let yourself be led by your intuition.
MYSTERY BOARD GAME: A horrible crime was committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor thirty years ago. Now the mansion is haunted by the ghost of the murdered servant and it’s up to a group of psychic investigators to get to the bottom of the mystery.
COOPERATIVE BOARD GAME: One player takes on the role of the victim (who is now a ghost) and the rest play as psychics. Over the course of the game, players work together to solve a mystery by psychically communicating with the victim. The ghost tries to lead psychics to the correct culprit.
INTERPRET VISIONS TO SOLVE MYSTERIES: Each player investigates a case assigned to them to determine who the actual murderer is. Psychics receive numerous visions from the ghost with clues. Can they determine the weapon, location and killer, or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?
HIGH VARIABILITY: Dozens of different suspects, weapons and locations ensure no two games are the same! LOOKING FOR A NEW CHALLENGE? Expansion sets are available (Expansions require base game to play).

Read more

A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it.

In Mysterium, one player tries to lead the investigators to their culprit.

Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you?

Can the psychics determine the weapon, location, and identity of the murderer?

Or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?

Read more

They will have to decipher the images to help the ghost remember how he was murdered.

  • Who?
  • Where?
  • What weapon?

The more players cooperate, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit!

Each player must investigate a case assigned to them, determining if the clues lead to the actual murderer.

While playing the ghost or a medium, you’ll have fun trying to guess what other players have on their minds.

Read more

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:50:50 UTC – Details)


Family Faceoff is soon to be a Family Game Night Favorite! Imagine if charades, a scavenger hunt, and karaoke night had a baby. That’s Family Faceoff. This game is meant to get you moving. It will exercise your body, your mind, and your funny bone. It’s the kind of game where parents and kids are equal, and you could finish in 20 minutes, or spend an entire rainy day playing.
Your next family favorite on game night! Teams FACE OFF in four lively categories that will tickle your funny bone and get your mind and body moving.
Created in the minds of the virally funny Holderness Family and brought to you by the creators of Watch Ya’ Mouth. Over a billion views + millions of games sold = winning combination.
Family Friendly! A simple, easy game where kids and adults are on equal ground that can be played nearly anywhere. Need to spice up a family game night, holiday party, road trip, beach trip, airport wait, etc. ? Leave it to Family Faceoff to bring the heat.
Fast, frenzied, competitive fun! Can be played in 20 minutes if you’re feeling feisty.
400 family-friendly cards great for kids and adults aged 8 years old to 100. Download the App for an extra layer of fun!

4.5
